channel.title: Coding a MMORPG bot
channel.description:
I play a MMORPG called The 4th Coming (T4C). There was a cheat program for it called T4C Pak Process (TPP). This program was made for version 1.25 of T4C, but now they are up to version 1.5 and the program is now obsolete.
I am interested in updating this program to make it compatible with 1.5.
The program was written with Visual C++ 6. So I need to learn a bit of that before i get started.
I've read a little bit about packet sniffing and I think this is what I need.
What else is needed to update this program?
Please point me to links, books, suggestions, ideas, etc

item.title: Coding a MMORPG bot
item.dc:creator: @rhijaen rhijaen
item.description:
@rhijaen wrote:

I doubt they change the protocol often…

The developer of the game brings out an update only once about every 8 months, so I think it will be possible.

I’ve changed my course from going straight into the bot to decoding the packets.

When i try to sniff the packets with Ethereal or WPE Pro, there are 10+ packets a second. How do i determine which is the one I need? This is my first attempt at MMORPG hacking.

Is there some sort of encryption on MMORPG UDP packets? and how do i decrypt it?

ANY links, suggestions, or books on this subject will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding a MMORPG bot
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

rhijaen:

It works as a proxy between the t4c client and server.

Sounds like how AutoRune worked for runescape.

If the game creator’s acquired any sense they may have started to change the protocol every week like runescape does, rendering the bot completely useless. Otherwise if they simply change a few packets with every release you could just find the new packet IDs that correspond to the old ones and change them, giving you a working bot again.

So depending on what is in the update from 1.25 to 1.5, updating this bot could be easy, hard, or impossible.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding a MMORPG bot
item.dc:creator: @rhijaen rhijaen
item.description:
@rhijaen wrote:

Original website in French: http://www.foxysofts.com/index.php?l=content/4thcoming/tpp.inc&PHPSESSID=3710952700d81d2eb28f7a518261b99c

Website translated via Google Language Tools: http://translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foxysofts.com%2Findex.php%3Fl%3Dcontent%2F4thcoming%2Ftpp.inc%26PHPSESSID%3D3710952700d81d2eb28f7a518261b99c&langpair=fr%7Cen&hl=en&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&prev=%2Flanguage_tools

The source has recently been released.

It works as a proxy between the t4c client and server.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

I don’t know what else you’d need to update the bot. Can you tell us more about how it works?
